name: SEMINYAK Foldover Clutch-Tan
description:
The Seminyak Foldover Clutch features one-of-a-kind hand-woven Ikat textiles paired with leather accents. Option of vertical or horizontal leather placement.

• Measurements: 10"w x 12"h flat. 10"w x 7"h folded.
• Spacious main compartment with inside zipper.
• Hidden magnetic clasp in center.
• Lined in cotton canvas.
• Use care when handling*. Dry clean Ikat fabric area only.

*Each handbag has been made with artisan craftsmanship using quality leather and solid brass hardware. The hand-woven Ikat fabric comes from Indonesia and is one-of-a-kind – no two are alike. Each handbag is unique as a result of the handcrafted techniques used. Any imperfections or variations are considered normal characteristics of this product.

name: ULUWATU Wallet Purse-Tan
description:
The Uluwatu Wallet features one-of-a-kind hand-woven Ikat textiles accentuated with whip-stitched leather. 

• Measurements: 9.5"w x 5.5"h.
• Main compartment with antique brass zipper closure and leather tassel.
• 4 convenient inner credit card slots.
• Lined in cotton canvas.
• Use care when handling*. Dry clean Ikat fabric area only.

*Each handbag has been made with artisan craftsmanship using quality leather and solid brass hardware. The hand-woven Ikat fabric comes from Indonesia and is one-of-a-kind – no two are alike. Each handbag is unique as a result of the handcrafted techniques used. Any imperfections or variations are considered normal characteristics of this product.

name: KUTA Wristlet Clutch-Tan
description:
The Kuta Wristlet Clutch features one-of-a-kind hand-woven Ikat textiles paired with leather accents. 

• Measurements: 10"w x 7"h.
• Spacious main compartment with inside zipper and pocket.
• Removable wrist strap.
• Lined in cotton canvas.
• Use care when handling*. Dry clean Ikat fabric area only.

*Each handbag has been made with artisan craftsmanship using quality leather and solid brass hardware. The hand-woven Ikat fabric comes from Indonesia and is one-of-a-kind – no two are alike. Each handbag is unique as a result of the handcrafted techniques used. Any imperfections or variations are considered normal characteristics of this product.

name: UBUD Weekender Duffle-Tan
description:
The Ubud Weekender Duffle features one-of-a-kind hand-woven Ikat textiles, accentuated with leather handles, trim and base. 

• Measurements: 20"w x 13"h x 6”d.
• Spacious main compartment with antique brass zipper closure
• 38” Adjustable & removable leather shoulder strap. 
• Double-rolled handles for comfort.
• Lined in solid black cotton
• Convenient outer zipper as well as inner zipper pocket with opposite facing accessory compartments. 
• Reinforced brass feet on bottom provides structure and support
• Use care when handling*. Dry clean Ikat fabric area only.

*Each handbag has been made with artisan craftsmanship using quality leather and solid brass hardware. The hand-woven Ikat fabric comes from Indonesia and is one-of-a-kind – no two are alike. Each handbag is unique as a result of the handcrafted techniques used. Any imperfections or variations are considered normal characteristics of this product.
